text: Mary Martha Byrne (December 23, 1969) is an American television actress. She appears mostly in soap operas. She played Lily in As the World Turns. She played Andrea in General Hospital. She was born in Ridgewood, New Jersey. ==References== Category:People from Ridgewood, New Jersey Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:1969 births Category:Living people
title: Martha Byrne
